title: 15 Editor-Favorite Body Lotions For Smooth Skin
description: If there's one beauty product that most people we speak with are too lazy to use, it's body lotion. But here's the thing: you need to moisturize your entire body all year, but especially during the months when many of us are more prone to dry skin. Just like the face, our body gets dry, flaky, and - in extreme cases - cracked when it's not properly hydrated. But with so many body lotions, butters, creams, and oils on the market, it's hard to know where to start and which ones are actually good. That's why we're here to help. You'll want to consider what's on the ingredient list. There are several to look out for specifically when shopping for a new body lotion or body butter. Shea butter, hyaluronic acid, glycerin, ceramides, and urea are classic hydrators that help the skin retain moisture, and in some cases, help absorb moisture in the air, which is why you should always apply your lotion right after the shower when the bathroom is still steamy. In addition to the classic hydrating ingredients, body moisturizers can also sometimes contain light exfoliating ingredients such as glycolic acid that help dissolve rough or dead skin cells on the epidermis, which in turn help the skin better absorb said hydrating ingredients. Keeping your body in tip-top hydrated condition isn't just good for keeping tight, dry, scaly arms and legs at bay; it can also have other positive effects. Not only will it make your skin glow naturally, but if you're a faux-tan lover, using body lotion consistently ensures that your faux glow looks better and lasts longer. If you shave or are sunburnt, using a good after-sun lotion helps soothe irritation or redness. And if you choose a moisturizer with fragrance, you'll smell great, too. But if you're turned off by the feeling of a thick cream on your body, fear not, because there are so many different types of moisturizers that'll keep your skin hydrated without feeling sticky. Read on to see which body moisturizers, lotions, and butters will be slathered on our editors all year.
author: Tori Crowther
excerpt: These are the best body lotions and body butters for hydrated and soft skin, all tested by PS editors. Shop them now!
